name: barbershop-project
description: Barbershop appointment system - CS50W Capstone Project

scripts.backend-migrate: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py migrate
scripts.backend-makemigrations: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py makemigrations

scripts.backend-shell-plus: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py shell
